director.name: 耶尔齐·霍夫曼 Jerzy Hoffman

this_title: Ukraine, the Birth of a Nation
trans_title: 乌克兰，一个国家的诞生
introduction: [Yepster添加, 并预计在2014制作听译字幕, 忙又懒]Jerzy Hoffman 2008年拍摄的电视纪录片http://www.amazon.com/Ukraine-Birth-Nation/dp/B001T852SW/ref=cm_cr_pr_pb_tA brilliant historical documentary film in 4 parts about the history of Ukraine, made by film producer Jerzy Hoffman, covers 4 chronological divisions from early times to the present. Highly informative, fast-paced and colorful, the film is a first of its kind! A professionally-made, interesting, generally balanced and informative documentary film that covers all of Ukrainian history.  It contains rare film footage, good cinematography and Hoffman's perceptive summaries of distinct historical periods.Part I "From Rus to Ukraine"Part II "Ukraine or Little Russia?"Part III "Together Forever"Part IV "Independence"
chinese_title: 乌克兰，一个国家的诞生
foreign_title: Ukraine, the Birth of a Nation
